subject: Sequential Shifter Not Returning to Center – Replacement Request
description_text:
Hello,


I hope you’re doing well and happy holidays.


I recently purchased a sequential shifter from Simsonn on September 30,
2025, along with pedals and a handbrake. I’m currently experiencing an
issue where the sequential shifter does not return to center after shifting
up.


I’ve spoken with a couple of friends who are using the same Simsonn
sequential shifter, and they are encountering the same issue as well. This
leads me to believe it may be a hardware-related problem.


I wanted to ask if there is a way to have the shifter swapped out or
replaced. I’d be happy to provide any additional information, order
details, or troubleshooting steps if needed.


Thank you very much for your time and support. I appreciate your help and
look forward to your response.


Best regards,

Damien

conversations.body_text: Hi Damien Jassor,  This is an issue with the spring. We can send you a replacement spring to change it. The old version of the sequential shifter has been discontinued, and we are improving its structure. Please provide your contact name, shipping address, and phone number so we can arrange the replacement.

Awesome, thank you for the quick response. My name is Damien Jassor, phone
contact is 4802859719 and my address is 18416 North Cave creek road, apt
2075, Phoenix AZ 85032

On Sat, Dec 27, 2025 at 8:52 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Damien Jassor,  OK, WE WILL SHIP IT ASAP.

Hello did you guys ship the parts if so can I have a tracking number
please thank you

On Tue, Dec 30, 2025 at 3:02 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Damien Jassor, We have shipped your package. The tracking number is JSELG3188060116YQ. You can track your package at: https://parcelsapp.com/en/tracking/JSELG3188060116YQ.

Hey so when will I receive these parts? I've been waiting patiently

On Thu, Jan 8, 2026, 3:24 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Damien Jassor,  We apologize for the current shipping delays. We have attached the latest shipping information for your reference, and we have already urged the shipping company to expedite the delivery.

That’s only to the USA not to my mail box. I haven’t received this product
yet.

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026 at 8:36 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Damien Jassor,  The package is still in transit.
